burnFeeTips_1: The redeem fee is the service fee charged by BFM Pay for token redeeming, excluding miner fees. It will be deducted from the token you unstake.
burnFeeTips_2: The redeem fee varies by token type, with specific rates shown on the page. When executing a redeem contract, the final token amount received will be the unstaked amount minus the redeem fee.
burnYour_{bchain}TokensAt_1:1RatioAnytim: Redeem your tokens at 1:1 ratio anytime, anywhere to unstaking your tokens
stakeYour_{chain}TokensAt_1:1RatioAnytim: Stake your tokens at 1:1 ratio anytime, anywhere to mint tokens
theAmoubtYouStakeCanNotExceedYourBalance: The amount you stake can not exceed your balance
tokenMinting_&amp;BurningContractOfficia: Token Minting & Redemption Contract Officially Launched, try it now
